overview: Big-Busted Babes Go Wilder Than Wild! Party with 25 huge-hootered babes and the editors of SCORE magazine on a luxury yacht in the Caribbean. Boob Cruise Paradise showcases all the action the Boob Cruise is famous for—the totally wild after-hour parties and gorgeous beaches—all in the company of the world's most fabulously endowed, bikini-bashing babes. This DVD combines the action of Boob Cruise '98 and Boob Cruise After Hours into a magical three-hour tour.
title: Boob Cruise Paradise
